name: GeckoTerminal
description: TON DEX pool and token data -- trending, new, and top pools, trades, OHLCV, token info, batch prices

tools.name: gecko_trending_pools
tools.description: Get trending pools on TON by activity

tools.name: gecko_new_pools
tools.description: Get newly created pools on TON (last 48h)

tools.name: gecko_top_pools
tools.description: Get top pools on TON by liquidity and volume

tools.name: gecko_search_pools
tools.description: Search pools by token name, symbol, or address

tools.name: gecko_pool_info
tools.description: Get detailed info for a specific pool

tools.name: gecko_pool_trades
tools.description: Get recent trades for a pool

tools.name: gecko_pool_ohlcv
tools.description: Get OHLCV candlestick data for a pool

tools.name: gecko_token_info
tools.description: Get full token data (price, volume, FDV, supply)

tools.name: gecko_token_pools
tools.description: Get all pools trading a specific token

tools.name: gecko_token_prices
tools.description: Batch price lookup for multiple tokens (up to 30)
